name: Abandon Ship! (theMADturtle)
description:
This game was made for the Trijam #110 game jam with the theme "give up before it's too late" in the span of three hours. you play as a little astronaut trying to escape from his self-destructing spaceship. you better get to the exit before it's too late!

Controls:

  • WASD - move
  • SPACE - jump
